user_request: Write a quatrain (ABAB) about the first day of spring.
final_poem:
Amidst winter' end, whispers dance in air with grace (A)  
The bloom of life begins as nature’s touch embraces Spring time face to face; (B)   
Crocus petals open softly beneath the thawing earth,(A) [introducing imagery associated directly related information]    
As ice surrenders, and green buddies from winter' s death give birth.   [(Repeating first day of spring concept through contrast)]  (B
